p: The essential oil of RC (0.1, 1, 10, or 30 μg/ml) showed no contractile effect on the ileum ( N = 6–8). RC oil (1 or 10 μg/ml) induced considerable relaxation on histamine-precontracted, atropine- and tetrodotoxin-pretreated preparations ( Table 5 ). Similar results were obtained on preparations without atropine and tetrodotoxin pretreatment ( N = 6–8, data not shown).
